response.original_title: When the Alphabet Hides in Your Mouth
response.overview: From writer and director B. H. Paulson comes a unique and bizarre cinematic experience.  Over 30 years in the making, this is the first part of an ambitious trilogy involving mind control, time travel, alien conspiracies, surreal plots within plots, and a plan to overthrow reality.  It is equally meditative, hilarious, and scary. Are you prepared for such an experience? Of course not! No one is. But if you are open to something bold, then get ready for an out of control mind trip that will merit multiple viewings and contemplative explorations.
response.tagline: Are YOU ready to overthrow reality?
response.title: When the Alphabet Hides in Your Mouth
